passages.text: An important case came on at the Gateshead Gonnty Police-court on Saturday, proceedings having been taken by the Home Offece against the manager of the Uaworth Colliery, for iegal shothe..ing on March 2nd, the day on which the disastrous exploffon, by which forty-two lives were lost, ocvurred at that calliery. The summons was issued against Mr. A, 8. Palmer, who was present, asagent of the colliery. Mr. Arnold Morley, M.P.. proseeuted on behalf the Crown, and Mr. R. PF. Cooper, Neweastle  appeared
rofarren to a superior court. The cage was ad jurned
